robotlibrary.rotary¶

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Rotary

This class deals with the rotary encoders for the remote control. Don't use directly or edit.
class robotlibrary.rotary.Rotary(dt, clk, sw, rc)¶

This class deals with the rotary encoders for the remote control. Don’t use directly or edit.

ROT_CCW = 2¶
SW_PRESS = 4¶
SW_RELEASE = 8¶
